verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhura acintya prabhāva
ebe śuna prabhura yaiche haya 'āvirbhāva'

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; acintya prabhāva—inconceivable influence; ebe—now; śuna—hear; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yaiche—in which way; haya—there is; āvirbhāva—appearance.
translation: In this way, one should understand the inconceivable potencies of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. Now please hear how His appearance [āvirbhāva] takes place.
